programme.desc: Guantánamo Diary: rendition, torture and detention without charge | Steroids, syringes and stigma: the quest for the perfect male six-packs

programme.title: 'Revenge pornography': Chrissy Chambers' search for justice
programme.desc: In April, it became a crime in England and Wales to post ‘revenge pornography’. Chrissy Chambers and her girlfriend Bria are YouTube’s most popular lesbian content creators.

programme.title: Black Sheep
programme.desc: Black Sheep tells the story of Cornelius Walker, whose life changed on 27 November 2000 - the day Damilola Taylor was killed. Damilola was 10, the same age as Cornelius.

programme.title: Murder, corruption and cattle barons in Kenya | Finding Ashley
programme.desc: Murder, corruption and cattle barons in Kenya | Finding Ashley: a Native American family's desperate search for their missing relative

programme.title: Puerto Rico after Hurricane Maria | The Yamuna, India's most polluted river
programme.desc: Puerto Rico after Hurricane Maria: 'We're American, too, why don't they help?' | The Yamuna, India's most polluted river

programme.title: Rowdy Flock: a daughter, her dreams, and a sheep farm in Norway
programme.desc: When Rakel took over the last farm in her Norwegian village, she was not only taking responsibility for a flock of accident-prone woolly animals, but also a way of life at a crossroads.

programme.title: Old Lesbians
programme.desc: From first crush to first love, from the closet to coming out and from loss to connection. For the last 25 years, retired schoolteacher Arden Eversmeyer travelled from Houston across the US to record hundreds of oral 'herstories' from a rapidly disappearing population.

programme.title: Daisy Chain: Can a Cornish town adapt to survive another lockdown?
programme.desc: When the remote town of St Just, Cornwall, was locked down in March 2020, the small community worried that its economy wouldn't survive.

programme.title: The captain rescuing migrants in the Mediterranean during the Covid-19 pandemic
programme.desc: Savvas Kourepinis is the captain of the Astral, a humanitarian boat patrolling the Mediterranean Sea to rescue people attempting to cross the main maritime route from north Africa to Europe.

programme.title: Off The Page
programme.desc: PPE | Devil in the Detail | School Gate

programme.title: On the Ground
programme.desc: Split loyalties: coming of age inside Putin's Russia | Ukraine's frontline: trench warfare, drones and defending a ghost town

programme.title: This is the NHS
programme.desc: The doctors who save the sickest babies | Love and dementia: 'Grandad's like a naughty five-year-old'

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - Guardian Cities
programme.desc: Guardian Cities: Pyongyang calling: we spent a week in North Korea | Guardian Tokyo week: Looking for cheap rent? Try a haunted house

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: Why genocide is so hard to prove | How the US military suppressed China's Covid-19 vaccine | How the banana industry funded violence | How Russia is winning the arms race in Ukraine

programme.title: Meet the artists
programme.desc: Thomas Schütte | Luc Tuymans

programme.title: Can women save sumo? The crossroads facing Japan's national sport
programme.desc: The ancient Japanese sport of sumo is in well-documented crisis. Years of controversy and scandal have hurt the sport's ability to attract new talent.

programme.title: Right to fight: Martial arts fighter with Down's syndrome
programme.desc: Garrett Holeve (aka G Money) has always dreamt of being a Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) fighter, and with the full support of his parents, prepares to fight another disabled opponent. But Florida authorities deemed the contest a health risk.

programme.title: Fight or flight: the veterans at war with PTSD
programme.desc: One hundred years on from the end of the first world war, a group of veterans in Dorset are torn between their pride in their military careers and their anger over the lack of psychological support provided to them by the Ministry of Defence.

programme.title: 2020: A Covid Space Odyssey
programme.desc: A short diary of astronaut Jessica Meir during her seven-month mission on the International Space Station (September 2019 - April 2020).

programme.title: Lord of the Rain: one man's fight against climate catastrophe
programme.desc: Doyte lives in South Omo, Ethiopia, one of the most remote areas in the world and hard hit by the climate crisis. As Lord of the Rain, it’s Doyte’s job to summon the rains, but for five years they haven’t come.

programme.title: Trapped in a city of a thousand mountains
programme.desc: A new phenomenon has taken the internet by storm: Chinese rap. But behind its skyrocketing popularity, there is a struggle for freedom of speech.

programme.title: How a conference call sparked America's abortion obsession | The Daphne Project
programme.desc: How a conference call sparked America's abortion obsession | The Daphne Project: 'Journalism was her life': Daphne Caruana Galizia's family speak out

programme.title: Fighting addiction on Pine Ridge reservation
programme.desc: Whiteclay, Nebraska is a tiny unincorporated town that sits on the border with South Dakota.

programme.title: Heroin to Holyrood? Man behind 'illegal' drug van runs for Scottish parliament
programme.desc: Peter Krykant, who operates a van in Glasgow where people can safely take illegal drugs, is running for Holyrood as part of a campaign calling for the Scottish government to establish legal sites.

programme.title: 'Going undiagnosed' due to gender bias | Nuclear Narnia | London's toxic school runs
programme.desc: Thousands of autistic girls and women 'going undiagnosed' due to gender bias | Nuclear Narnia: why is Sellafield Europe's most dangerous industrial site? | London's toxic school runs: how polluted is the air children breathe?

programme.title: Could some birth-control methods kill you? | Life on Mars? Nasa's Hawaiian dome
programme.desc: Sweetening the pill: could some birth-control methods kill you? | The Hawaiian dome where Nasa prepares humanity for life on Mars

programme.title: Erica: Man made
programme.desc: Erica is 23. She has a beautiful, neutral face and speaks with a synthesised voice. She has a degree of autonomy – but can’t move her hands yet. Hiroshi Ishiguro is her ‘father’ and the bad boy of Japanese robotics.

programme.title: Emotional support animals - Creature comforts: has the US's emotional support animal epidemic gone too far?
programme.desc: Emotional support animals, or ESAs, have exploded across the US in recent years, with rising numbers of pet owners getting their animals certified online.

programme.title: Cinema of Ukraine: artists reflect on modern history, culture and people
programme.desc: The Guardian is celebrating Ukrainian cinema with a specially curated selection of documentaries, made before the current war.

programme.title: Dear Mamma: a transgender man, his mother and their journey in letters
programme.desc: When Naissa tells his mother Daniela that he identifies as a trans man she struggles to understand.

programme.title: Kherson: from heaven of Ukrainian liberation to hell of Russian bombardment
programme.desc: The southern city of Kherson was liberated from Russian occupation in November 2022 by Ukrainian forces, sparking ecstatic scenes in the main square.

programme.title: Refusing to fight: Israelis against the war in Gaza
programme.desc: For many Israelis, military service is a rite of passage that lasts two to three years. Being such a formative part of the social contract in Israel, it is unusual for eligible young people to refuse their draft orders.

programme.title: The Battle for Myanmar’s Buddhist spirit
programme.desc: In Myanmar, different groups of Buddhist monks are battling with how to deal with the country’s minority Muslim population. While some advocate peace, others, such as the extremist Ma Ba Tha, are stoking up hatred and violence.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali | Sucker punch: small town boxing in rural America
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali: 'a personality that transcended his sport' | Sucker punch: small town boxing in rural America is going mainstream - but who benefits?

programme.title: La caravana: On the road with the migrant caravan
programme.desc: Thousands of migrants from Honduras, El Salvador and Guatemala head north hoping to find work and a better life in the US.

programme.title: Paris: where street basketball meets hip-hop | Mark Rothko murals at Tate Modern
programme.desc: Paris: where street basketball meets hip-hop | Waves of mysterious meaning: Mark Rothko murals at Tate Modern

programme.title: Colette
programme.desc: 90-year-old Colette Marin-Catherine confronts her past by visiting the German concentration camp Mittelbau-Dora where her brother was killed. As a young girl, she fought Hitler's Nazis as a member of the French Resistance.

programme.title: Four weddings
programme.desc: Not all weddings are about marrying a prince. This documentary tells the story of four special weddings around the world from the point of view of the bride.

programme.title: Meet the brewers of the craft beer revolution | Neuro-cuisine: exploring the science of flavour
programme.desc: Meet the brewers of the craft beer revolution | Neuro-cuisine: exploring the science of flavour

programme.title: Flat Earth: meet the people casting aside 2,500 years of science
programme.desc: Though not a new phenomenon, flat Earth theory has enjoyed a huge resurgence recently.

programme.title: Garth Nix answers your questions: on JRR Tolkien, gaming and pronouncing characters' names
programme.desc: In an ongoing series, Guardian Australia is getting kids and young adults to do the hard work instead of us – by interviewing their favourite authors.

programme.title: David Bowie remembered by two of his biggest fans | Free improvisation in underground music
programme.desc: David Bowie remembered by two of his biggest fans | Free improvisation: still the ultimate in underground music?

programme.title: Behind the scenes on Birmingham derby day with football fans and police
programme.desc: Police on the streets separating rival supporters, cordons restricting access around the ground, holding the away end back after full time: these are familiar experiences for football fans attending derbies up and down the country.

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - Guardian Cities
programme.desc: Guardian Cities: City champions: 'Make them look twice and think twice' | How we've told the great story of urbanisation

programme.title: Seascape: the state of our oceans
programme.desc: Covid waste: disposable masks and latex gloves turn up on seabed | Unsafe Passage: on board a refugee rescue ship racing for Europe | Indonesia's shark fishermen: 24 went out, 20 came back. What happened on the boat? | Four kids left: The Thai school swallowed by the sea

programme.title: The Guardian Cities - The artist and their city
programme.desc: The artist and their city: Abraham Cruzvillegas: 'Mexico City is about to collapse… yet it's optimistic' | The truth about Tehran, by artist Nazgol Ansarinia: 'It's building a fantasy future' | Artist Doris Salcedo on Bogotá: 'The forces at work here are brutal'

programme.title: After Windrush – Paulette Wilson's visit to Jamaica, 50 years on
programme.desc: A letter from the British government classifying Paulette Wilson as an illegal immigrant shook her sense of identity and belonging.

programme.title: Death land
programme.desc: The people on a mission to live for ever | Before I die: a day with terminally ill patients

programme.title: Why?
programme.desc: Why Bitcoin is so bad for the planet | Why we are all attracted to conspiracy theories

programme.title: Off The Page
programme.desc: PPE | Devil in the Detail | School Gate

programme.title: Why is anti-immigration sentiment on the rise in Canada?
programme.desc: Canada has long been celebrated for its welcoming stance towards immigrants, fostering a prosperous, multicultural society. But in recent years, rising concerns over living costs and housing shortages have fueled a mounting scepticism of the country’s mass immigration policies.

programme.title: Frozen in Time: the motherhood dilemma for single women in China
programme.desc: Fertility tourism is booming for single Chinese women with hopes of future motherhood.

programme.title: The year that never ended: how a Ukrainian comedian rebuilt a stranger's house
programme.desc: The Ukrainian comedian Vasyl Baidak sparks an unlikely and enduring friendship with retiree Iryna Terekhova when he joins a group of young people from Kyiv to rebuild her home.

programme.title: We swam to Hong Kong for freedom | The Chagos Islanders taking back their birthplace
programme.desc: We swam to Hong Kong for freedom half a century ago. What now?' | The Chagos Islanders taking back their birthplace from the British: 'They uprooted us'

programme.title: Fighting Shame
programme.desc: A group of women use everyday items to tell of the sacrifices and difficult choices they face, and the community initiatives they have launched in an attempt to tackle the shame surrounding poverty and make policymakers listen.

programme.title: No ball games: life and play through the eyes of children across the UK
programme.desc: Celebrating the imagination and resourcefulness of young children across the UK by understanding the outdoor games they invent, inherit and play.

programme.title: The Battle for Myanmar’s Buddhist spirit
programme.desc: In Myanmar, different groups of Buddhist monks are battling with how to deal with the country’s minority Muslim population. While some advocate peace, others, such as the extremist Ma Ba Tha, are stoking up hatred and violence.

programme.title: The Native American kids who get $200k for graduating
programme.desc: The Ho-Chunk Nation are a Native American tribe that owns a string of casinos across Wisconsin. Ho Chunk children get a share of casino profits once they’ve graduated and turned 18.

programme.title: The teenager left paralysed by 'one tiny mistake' | Living with disabilities under austerity
programme.desc: The teenager left paralysed by 'one tiny mistake' | Living with disabilities under austerity: 'You're treated worse than a farm animal'

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already "living in the future"!

programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China.

programme.title: Living China
programme.desc: Real life stories told from the personal perspective. Moving, dramatic, sorrows and joys, expressed emphatically and expressed quietly. Watch closely to see and understand the real China as it is lived.

programme.title: Special Edition
programme.desc: Prestige Chinese documentary production, tackling serious subjects with the best cinematography, editing, and all round production values with a unique Chinese perspective.

programme.title: Journeys and Discoveries
programme.desc: A documentary series showcasing the history of China and its people.

programme.title: History in the Frame
programme.desc: A documentary series featuring historical and archaeological exploration.

programme.title: Best Eats
programme.desc: Food connects people! A feast for the eyes that spotlights the cuisines of China in a way that’s bound to set the mouths of the whole globe watering!

programme.title: Youthful China
programme.desc: The youth of a country is the future of that country. A series of documentaries focusing on the younger generation of China in which you get to see what they are achieving and what makes them tick!

programme.title: Pixel Collage
programme.desc: A well-crafted collage of selected short documentaries telling stories about all aspects of China! People, technology, culture, and wildlife, all are showcased in Internet-friendly form.

programme.title: Z samolotu do sieci
programme.desc: Dramatyczne nagrania z telefonu pokazują, jak wygląda pożar na pokładzie lecącego samolotu. Dowiemy się, jak strażacy radzą sobie z pożarami w lotnictwie.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Turbo jest na wojennej ścieżce i podejmuje największe ryzyko swojego życia. Steve Grahame, walcząc z awariami, przedziera się przez 2 tys. km nieutwardzonych dróg. Glenn Waters ma poważne problemy.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Matt Adams ma kłopoty, kiedy przewozi wyjątkowo trudny ładunek: transport byków. Yogi i jego ciężarówka dochodzą do granicy swoich możliwości. Bracia Stephens próbują uratować miliony pszczół.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Matt Adams wiezie ładunek byków — to najtrudniejszy kurs w jego karierze. Bracia Stephens w gęstym lesie muszą stoczyć ciężką walkę, aby uratować swoje cenne pszczoły.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Sludge, kierowca cysterny, przewożąc niebezpieczny ładunek o włos unika katastrofy. Steve Grahame wyrusza na nieznane terytorium z uszkodzonym sprzętem. Macka McCready mierzy się z fatalną pogodą.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S3 Ep5
programme.desc: Yogi przewozi ogromny ładunek, w dodatku kończy mu się czas. Jared Baldwin i Jonny Rayner, „królowie betonu", zjeżdżają z oznaczonej drogi i wpadają w kłopoty.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Kuter rodziny Jagerów stoi uziemiony w porcie od czterech miesięcy, jego kapitan Glenn stracił już 260 tys. dolarów przychodu. Squizzy ma cztery dni na uzupełnienie zapasów.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Na pokładzie Williama Norlinga napięcie osiąga punkt krytyczny. Marynarz Macca popełnia dramatyczny błąd. Bryce mierzy się z potężnym sztormem. Jay dostaje zamówienie do zrealizowania w 11 godzin.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep8
programme.desc: Bryce podejmuje ostatnią próbę uratowania sytuacji. Na pokładzie kutra Bold Contender morale jest niskie jak nigdy. Bracia Jagerowie podejmują wyzwanie, co ma poważne konsekwencje.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Australijscy poławiacze homarów S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Kapitanowie kutrów pokazują, jak wygląda życie w ich świecie. Awarie silników, nowe technologie, drogie urządzenia i wielkie katastrofy na morzu: walka z maszynami to codzienność poławiaczy homarów.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.desc: Katastrofy i śmierć są zawsze obecne w życiu poławiaczy homarów, którzy nieustannie walczą z Matką Naturą. Dowiemy się, jak kapitanowie radzą sobie ze zmiennymi pływami, prądami morskimi i pogodą.

programme.title: Australijscy poszukiwacze złota
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Australijscy poszukiwacze złota S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Kończy się kolejny sezon. Dirt Dogs aby zrealizować swój cel muszą dostarczyć złoto za 233 tys. dolarów. Rod, partner Alexa, opuszcza ekipę Scrappers. Gold Gypsies jeszcze raz pokonują złodziei złota.

programme.title: Poszukiwacze klejnotów: Australia
programme.desc: Życie poszukiwaczy klejnotów wyznacza pogoda - na terenie ich prac od dwóch lat panuje susza. Każdy poszukiwacz potrzebuje wody, aby wypłukiwać wydobywaną ziemię. Bez wody nie ma drogich kamieni...

programme.title: Poszukiwacze klejnotów: Australia
programme.desc: Todd i Brianna ciężko pracują, walcząc z awariami sprzętu, upałem i pyłem; czy uda im się pogodzić życie rodzinne z rozwijaniem wydobycia szafirów?

programme.title: Poszukiwacze klejnotów: Australia
programme.desc: Po stu latach ciągłego kopania, dziewicza ziemia jest rzadkością na terenie Gemfields; Rowan Richardson chce sprawdzić nową działkę — i wykopuje dużo więcej, niż się spodziewał!

programme.title: Poszukiwacze klejnotów: Australia
programme.desc: Mifsudowie szybko orientują się, że wydobywanie szafirów jest bardzo trudnym zajęciem. Ray i Paul używają swojej 40-tonowej wiertnicy, aby dokopać się do starych tuneli.

programme.title: Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Wielki Mur z Ashem Dykesem Ep6
programme.desc: W ostatnim rozdziale swojej podróży Ash trafia do niesławnych ruin twierdzy znanej jako Nefrytowe Wrota. Tam kończy się jego dziesięciotygodniowa wyprawa wzdłuż Wielkiego Muru.

programme.title: Demolka na antypodach
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Demolka na antypodach S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Penelope i jej ekipa burzą wielką rezydencję. Pracownicy Masters Civil rozbierają fabrykę na tętniącym życiem terenie przemysłowym, a firma Logan City Demolitions toczy walkę ze starym budynkiem.

programme.title: Demolka na antypodach
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Demolka na antypodach S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Pete i jego ekipa zajmują się domem szeregowym, ekipa Watkins Demolition rozbiera starą linię produkcyjną, a Deno i chłopaki z Greenway Demolition wyburzają dom w Queensland.

programme.title: Demolka na antypodach
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Demolka na antypodach S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Ekipa Greenway Demolition rozbiera gigantyczną rezydencję na wzgórzu, ekipa Masa Demolition — sklep na rogu ulicy, a Gumdale Demolition rozwala wyjątkowo podstępny blok.

programme.title: Demolka na antypodach
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Demolka na antypodach S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Ekipa Masters Civil za pomocą dwóch rozdrabniarek przerabia tony betonu na placu rozbiórki, a pracownicy firmy Calora Demolition stalową kulą wyburzają stary dom opieki.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Transport drewna wartego milion dolarów może utknąć w drodze — chyba że Craig wymyśli jakiś plan; tymczasem w dolinie Brent ma wielotygodniowe zaległości w pracy.

programme.title: Z samolotu do sieci
programme.desc: Tylko w 2017 r. komercyjne linie lotnicze przewiozły ponad cztery miliardy osób w ramach regularnych lotów. Analizujemy wpływ, jaki pasażerowie mają na tę stale rozwijającą się branżę.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Transport drewna wartego milion dolarów może utknąć w drodze — chyba że Craig wymyśli jakiś plan; tymczasem w dolinie Brent ma wielotygodniowe zaległości w pracy.

programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Demolka na antypodach S4 Ep4
programme.desc: Ekipa Masters Civil za pomocą dwóch rozdrabniarek przerabia tony betonu na placu rozbiórki, a pracownicy firmy Calora Demolition stalową kulą wyburzają stary dom opieki.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Gloverowie ścigają się z czasem, ściągając drewno i maszyny z Erie Mountain. Ekipa Craiga także ma coraz mniej czasu; Craig jest przekonany, że używana maszyna, którą właśnie kupił, zapewni mu sukces.

programme.title: Z samolotu do sieci
programme.desc: Specjaliści w dziedzinie lotnictwa, członkowie załóg i psychologowie opowiedzą nam o stresie obciążającym pracowników linii lotniczych, personel lotniskowy, pilotów, załogi i pasażerów.

programme.title: Poszukiwacze klejnotów: Australia
programme.desc: Potężne powodzie i małe tornado prawie sparaliżowały prace na terenie Gemfields. Z drugiej strony wreszcie pojawiła się tak potrzebna woda, a niewielkie zniszczenia nie powstrzymają zapału górników.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Jared Baldwin i Jonny Rayner usiłują wykopać się z błota. Steve Grahame ma kłopoty na trasie na bezludną wyspę. Turbo walczy z biurokracją, aby utrzymać swój biznes w ruchu.

programme.title: Demolka na antypodach
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Demolka na antypodach S4 Ep5
programme.desc: Ekipa Logan City Demolitions burzy 22 potężne silosy na paszę, ekipa Roach Demolition rozbiera rezydencję na wzgórzu, a Mr Dapy's Demolition zajmuje się domem na przedmieściach Adelajdy.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.desc: Największym wrogiem łowców homarów są podwodne drapieżniki. Dowiemy się, jakie wodne zwierzęta polują na homary, utrudniając rybakom pracę i zmniejszając połowy.

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Craig LeBeau i jego zespół przeżywają trudne chwile: poważny wypadek zmusza ich do ponownego przeanalizowania, czy opłaca im się praca w najbardziej niebezpiecznym zawodzie w całej Kanadzie.

programme.title: Dlaczego znikają samoloty: zagadka lotu MH370
programme.desc: Samolot linii Malaysia Airlines — lot MH370 — zniknął 8 marca 2014 r. z 239 pasażerami i członkami załogi na pokładzie. Czy nowa technologia radiowa mogłaby pomóc w odnalezieniu zaginionej maszyny?

programme.title: Poszukiwacze klejnotów: Australia
programme.desc: To prawie koniec sezonu górniczego. Wody jest w bród, Max i Glenn mogą wreszcie odpocząć. Todd i Brianna potrzebują dużej ilości szafirów, aby przetrwać lato.

programme.title: Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Ciężarówką po bezdrożach Australii S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Jared Baldwin i Jonny Rayner muszą się zatrzymać. Rosco Haining walczy z żywiołami, ciężarówką i własnym charakterem. Turbo odwiedzają policjanci.

programme.title: Demolka na antypodach
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Demolka na antypodach S4 Ep6
programme.desc: Demolition Australia burzy pełen azbestu dom w Sydney, Wollongong City Excavation and Demolition mierzy się z ogromnym magazynem, Mr Dapy's Demolition wraca na przedmieścia Adelajdy.

programme.title: Australijscy poławiacze homarów
programme.desc: Szyper Squizzy realizuje plan popsucia szyków swojemu rywalowi, Bryce'owi. Bryce wykorzystuje stary rybacki przesąd i chce przejąć cenne łowisko Snoddy'ego.

programme.title: Dlaczego znikają samoloty: zagadka lotu MH370
programme.desc: Samolot linii Malaysia Airlines — lot MH370 — zniknął 8 marca 2014 r. z 239 pasażerami i członkami załogi na pokładzie. Czy nowa technologia radiowa mogłaby pomóc w odnalezieniu zaginionej maszyny?

programme.title: Drwale z Kolumbii Brytyjskiej
programme.desc: Craig LeBeau i jego zespół przeżywają trudne chwile: poważny wypadek zmusza ich do ponownego przeanalizowania, czy opłaca im się praca w najbardziej niebezpiecznym zawodzie w całej Kanadzie.

programme.title: Poszukiwacze klejnotów: Australia
programme.desc: To prawie koniec sezonu górniczego. Wody jest w bród, Max i Glenn mogą wreszcie odpocząć. Todd i Brianna potrzebują dużej ilości szafirów, aby przetrwać lato.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Extreme Weather Countdown | The One Where Lightning Strikes Twice
programme.desc: From Florida's shores to Australia's outback, we traveled the world to collect videos that will blow you away.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Storm Hunters | Too Close for Comfort
programme.desc: Another chase through the hotbed of wicked weather puts the storm hunters a little too close to the danger zone. Will Mark & Jaclyn see the tornado they’re hoping for before it’s too late?

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Storm Hunters | Tornado Terror
programme.desc: On the last day of their chase the storm hunters are shaken to the core by a giant, unpredictable tornado.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Storm Hunters | Shear Strength
programme.desc: On his home turf in Canada, Mark and his team chase one of nature’s deadliest forces, coming face to face with tornadoes’ shear strength.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Storm Hunters | Knowing the Enemy
programme.desc: Jaclyn Whittal and Mark Robinson are in Tornado Alley to track down some of the most ferocious weather.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Extreme Weather Countdown | It's Raining Cats & Dogs & Boats
programme.desc: Mother Nature is back and ready to blow you away, with some of the fiercest, most electrifying, and most extreme weather we have ever seen! So buckle in and let’s get ready to ride!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Extreme Weather Countdown | My Trashcan is Gone with the Wind
programme.desc: Get ready, because it's time once again to watch some of the wildest weather videos you've ever seen! From thunderstorms to tornadoes, hail to flooding, we've got it all

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Extreme Weather Countdown | The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway
programme.desc: Are you ready for some electricyfing weather videos? Because we've got it all...wind storms, flashfloods, and even hurricanes! We've pulled together some of the craziest weather you've ever seen!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Extreme Weather Countdown | It's All Downfall from Here
programme.desc: The countdown has begun as we prepare for some of the most extreme weather caught on camera!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Extreme Weather Countdown | Darkest Before the Storm
programme.desc: Mother Nature is back and ready to show you just how powerful she can be!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Extreme Weather Countdown | 1000 Lawn Chairs in the Wind
programme.desc: It doesn't matter that there are over a 1000 tornados or millions of thunderstorms take place all over the world every year; someone is always going to be there to capture it and when they do, you know that we are going to show it to you!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Extreme Weather Countdown | Come Rain or High Water
programme.desc: Just when you thought it was safe to go back outside, we've go a brand new episode to change your mind! Brace yourselves, because we're about to head into frenzy once again! From twisty tornados to scary storms, we've got them all.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Extreme Weather Countdown | The One Where Lightning Strikes Twice
programme.desc: From Florida's shores to Australia's outback, we traveled the world to collect videos that will blow you away.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Storm Hunters | Too Close for Comfort
programme.desc: Another chase through the hotbed of wicked weather puts the storm hunters a little too close to the danger zone. Will Mark & Jaclyn see the tornado they’re hoping for before it’s too late?

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Storm Hunters | Tornado Terror
programme.desc: On the last day of their chase the storm hunters are shaken to the core by a giant, unpredictable tornado.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Storm Hunters | Shear Strength
programme.desc: On his home turf in Canada, Mark and his team chase one of nature’s deadliest forces, coming face to face with tornadoes’ shear strength.

programme.title: Storm Hunters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Storm Hunters | Knowing the Enemy
programme.desc: Jaclyn Whittal and Mark Robinson are in Tornado Alley to track down some of the most ferocious weather.

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Extreme Weather Countdown | It's Raining Cats & Dogs & Boats
programme.desc: Mother Nature is back and ready to blow you away, with some of the fiercest, most electrifying, and most extreme weather we have ever seen! So buckle in and let’s get ready to ride!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Extreme Weather Countdown | My Trashcan is Gone with the Wind
programme.desc: Get ready, because it's time once again to watch some of the wildest weather videos you've ever seen! From thunderstorms to tornadoes, hail to flooding, we've got it all

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Extreme Weather Countdown | The Cold Never Bothered Me Anyway
programme.desc: Are you ready for some electricyfing weather videos? Because we've got it all...wind storms, flashfloods, and even hurricanes! We've pulled together some of the craziest weather you've ever seen!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Extreme Weather Countdown | It's All Downfall from Here
programme.desc: The countdown has begun as we prepare for some of the most extreme weather caught on camera!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Extreme Weather Countdown | Darkest Before the Storm
programme.desc: Mother Nature is back and ready to show you just how powerful she can be!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Extreme Weather Countdown | 1000 Lawn Chairs in the Wind
programme.desc: It doesn't matter that there are over a 1000 tornados or millions of thunderstorms take place all over the world every year; someone is always going to be there to capture it and when they do, you know that we are going to show it to you!

programme.title: Extreme Weather Countdown

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Captured: Extreme Weather | Extreme Winters

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Captured: Extreme Weather | Vicious Winds
programme.desc: Volcanic ash engulfing a town, a massive firenado in California - just some of the viral weather videos caught on camera in this episode of Captured, as Vicious Winds take center stage.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Captured: Extreme Weather | Dangerous Skies
programme.desc: Mother Nature unleashes some of her most deadly forces to wreak havoc in the air and unexpectedly terrify her victims.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Captured: Extreme Weather | Sudden Danger
programme.desc: In these viral videos we witness how, in the blink of an eye, your day can become suddenly dangerous. Even on a beautiful day, when you're not expecting any severe weather at all, Mother Nature can sometimes be malicious and sneaky

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Captured: Extreme Weather | Fire & Water
programme.desc: A narrow escape from a raging wildfire – a dramatic encounter with a mudslide - the jaw-dropping images of a flash flood – just some of the encounters with two of nature’s most destructive forces caught on camera in this Fire and Water episode.

programme.title: Captured: Extreme Weather

programme.title: Viral Wild
